task.summary: Default task

Refactor project structure and reorganize codebase.
Moved all source files to a "src" directory and updated paths to reflect the new structure. Deleted old files and directories to clean up redundant or misplaced content. This change ensures better organization and maintainability of the project.

Refactor project structure and rename project folders.
Moved test projects to '/test' folder for consistency and clarity. Renamed "FIAP.Contatos" to "FIAP.Contatos.Api" for better alignment with its purpose. Updated references and namespaces to reflect the new structure.

Refactor solution to adopt new project structure
Reorganized the solution by replacing the old `FIAP.Contatos` modules with new streamlined projects: `FIAP.Api`, `FIAP.Domain`, `FIAP.Application`, and others. Removed outdated files and dependencies to align with the updated architecture. This improves maintainability and aligns the codebase with modern practices.

Add Docker Compose and project references
Introduced a `compose.yaml` file to enable Docker Compose support for the `fiap.api` service. Added necessary project references across multiple `.csproj` files to establish proper dependencies between application layers. This improves project structure and prepares the application for containerized deployment.

Add domain models, requests, responses, and validations
Introduced foundational domain-level classes and interfaces for handling requests, responses, and validations. Included support for paginated responses, contact management, and robust validation mechanisms with reusable helper methods. These additions establish the groundwork for future implementation of domain-specific logic.

Add response classes for handling various HTTP error cases
Introduced `NoContentResponse`, `BadRequestPagedResponse`, and `BadRequestResponse` classes to represent standardized HTTP responses for specific cases. These additions enhance response handling and improve code clarity for no-content and bad request scenarios.

Add EF Core integration and refactor infrastructure setup
Implemented Entity Framework Core with SQL Server support, including DbContext and entity configurations for the Contact domain model. Introduced Dependency Injection helper classes and service installers to streamline configuration and registration of infrastructure services. Removed unused `Class1` file and updated project dependencies accordingly.

Add SQL Server support, Swagger setup, and service installer
Added SQL Server container configuration in `compose.yaml` and connection string to `appsettings.json`. Integrated Swagger through a new `SwaggerServiceInstaller` class for API documentation. Refactored `Program.cs` to utilize service installation for better modularity and maintainability.

Remove Docker-related files and update configurations
Removed Docker setup and configuration files, including `compose.yaml` and `Dockerfile`, to streamline the project and eliminate unused dependencies. Updated connection strings, URLs, and project references to ensure consistency with the new configuration. Adjusted the solution file to reflect these changes.

Add initial migration and database schema setup
This commit introduces the first migration for the database, creating the "Contatos" table with columns for contact details such as name, email, phone, and timestamps. A unique index is added to the Email column. Supporting files for EF Core and database integration are also included.

Refactor response types to simplify parameters and add messages
Removed optional messages parameter from NoContentResponse for consistency and added a Messages property to PagedResponse. These changes improve clarity and align the structure of response types across the codebase.

Add middleware configuration mechanism
Introduced a centralized middleware configuration system using `IApplicationMiddleware` to streamline middleware setup. Renamed files and namespaces to better organize `ServicesConfig` and `MiddlewareConfig`. Updated Swagger configuration to apply only in development environments.

Add Contact handling logic and entity search extensions
Implemented `FindEntityExtensions` to streamline entity retrieval with validation in a DbSet. Added `ContactDataHandler` to manage CRUD operations for `Contact` entities. Updated `appsettings.json` to adjust the database connection string for localhost.

Replace NUnit with xUnit and update test structure
Removed Infrastructure and Domain unit test projects and migrated relevant tests to a new Domain.Test project using xUnit. Updated phone number regex for improved validation. Adjusted solution file to reflect new structure and dependencies.

Add unit test for ContactResponse JSON serialization
Introduced a test to validate JSON serialization and deserialization for the ContactResponse model. Ensures the object maintains integrity during the process, improving reliability and detecting potential issues.

Add Infrastructure.Test project with initial test setup
Created the Infrastructure.Test project, including references and configuration for test dependencies. Added an initial test class `ContactDataHandlerTest` with basic setup for testing the `ContactDataHandler` using an in-memory database. Updated the solution file to include the new test project.

Add unit tests for ContactDataHandler CRUD operations
This commit introduces comprehensive unit tests for the `ContactDataHandler`, covering Create, Update, Delete, GetById, and GetAll methods. These tests ensure proper functionality, success responses, and appropriate error handling when dealing with contact data.

Add new response types and service handling for contacts
Introduced `CreatedContentResponse`, `InternalErrorResponse`, and `InternalPagedErrorResponse` to handle different response scenarios. Added `ContactServiceHandler` for improved service operations and validation. Updated DI configuration with `ContactServiceHandler` and enhanced solution structure in the README.

Add Contact endpoints and enhance Swagger configuration
Introduce CRUD endpoints for managing contacts, including create, update, delete, and retrieve operations. Enhance Swagger setup with support for complex types, polymorphism, and non-nullable references. Add the Swashbuckle.AspNetCore package to support API documentation.

Refactor ContactEndpoint logic into ContactController
Moved ContactEndpoint methods into a new ContactController to align with RESTful API conventions and improve maintainability. Removed the ContactEndpoints class and updated Program.cs to use controllers instead of endpoint mapping. Minor adjustments made to Swagger configuration for schema handling.
